Translations.Text: Fast approaching est reckoning popol ili est oblivious averse
When proof ven al them el their Lord est neo ili auxskult al gxi heedlessly
Their mens est heedless. transgressors confer secretly Est li ne just human est vi? Vi akcept magic prezent vi
Li dir My Lord kon cxiu opini heaven ter. Li est Hearer Omniscient
Ili ecx dir Hallucinations Li far gxi Li est poet! Let him montr us mirakl like those de previous messengers
Ni neniam annihilated kred community en des preter. Est these popol believers
Ni ne send vi hom ni inspir. Pet those kon scripture vi ne kon
Ni ne don them korp mangx nor est ili immortal
Ni fulfilled our promes them; ni sav them together whomever ni willed annihilated transgressors
Ni send vi scripture containing your message Vi ne kompren
Many community ni terminated their transgression ni substituted ali popol their met
When our requital ven pas ili started kur
Ne kur ven your luks your mansions vi ten accountable
Ili dir Ve al us. Ni est really wicked
This ad est their proclamation gxis ni completely visx them out
Ni ne kre heavens ter cxio them just amusement
Ni bezon amusement ni iniciat gxi any da this est ki ni wanted do
Instead est our plan support truth falsehood en ord defeat gxi! Ve al vi por utterances vi utter
Him aparten everyone heavens ter those je Him est neniam tro arrogant worship Him nor do ili ever waver
Ili glor nokt tag sen ever lac
Ili trov di ter kre
Se tie est them (heavens ter) ali di DI tie est chaos. Glory est DI; Lord absolut auxtoritat Li est alt their pretend
Li est neniam est pet pri anything Li while all others questioned
Ili trov ali di Him? Dir Montr me your proof This est message my generaci consummating all previous messages Ja plej de them ne recognize truth; this est ili est tial hostile
Ni ne send any messenger vi inspiration Tie ne est di escept Me vi worship Me sol
sed ili dir plej Gracious begotten fil! Glory est Him. All (messengers) est (His) honor servants
Ili neniam parol sur their own ili strictly sekv His ordon
Li kon their future their preter. Ili ne intercede escept por those jam akcept Him kaj ili worried their own kol
any da them pretend est di Him ni requite him Infer; ni tiel requite des wicked
unbelievers ne realize ke heaven ter uz est 1 solid mes ke ni eksplod existence? El akv ni far all viv ajx! Ili kred
Ni ej ter stabilizers lest gxi tumbles them ni ej rekt roads therein ke ili direkt
Ni rendered cxiel gard plafon. sed ili est totally oblivious al all portents therein
Kaj Li est Unu kre nokt tag sun lun; each floating en its own orbit
Ni neniam dekret immortality anyone antaux vi; vi mort est ili immortal
Cxiu ul gust death post ni put vi test tra adversity prosperity tiam al us vi ultimately return
When those disbelieve vid vi, ili ridicule vi Est this unu challenges your di Meanwhile ili ceter totally heedless de message el plej Gracious
human est est impatient natur. Mi inevitably montr vi My sign; ne est such hurry
Ili challenge Kie ke (retribution vi est est truthful)
Nur those disbelieve envision when ili pen ward fajr - off their vizagx their dors! Ne 1 help them tiam
Ja gxi ven them suddenly ili utterly stunned Ili can nek evit gxi nor can ili ricev any respite
Messengers vi ridiculed consequently those ridiculed them incurred retribution por their ridiculing
Dir Who protekt vi el plej Gracious nokt tag? Ja ili est totally oblivious al message their Lord
Ili di Do hav protekt them el us? Ili ne ecx help. Nor can ili akompan unu another when ili summoned vizagx us
Ni hav proviz por these popol their ancestors up old agx! Ili ne seg cxiu tag ter brings them closer end Ili reverse this process
dir mi avert vi en accordance kun divine inspiration. surd ne auxd vok when ili avert
When sample your Lord's retribution aflikt them ili readily dir Ni est ja wicked
Ni establ skal de justice Tag Resurrection. Ne anim sufer malplej injustice. Eben ekvivalent de mustard seed vol est accounted por! Ni est plej efficient reckoners
Ni don Moses Aaron Statut Libr beacon reminder por des righteous
Unu reverence their Lord eben when sol en their privacy ili worry Hor
This tro est ben reminder ke ni send down Vi denying gxi
Antaux ke, ni granted Abraham his guidance kompren ni est fully aware da him
Li dir al his patr his popol Ki est these statu al which vi devoting
Ili dir Ni trov our parents worshipping them
Li dir Ja vi your parents ir totally astray
Ili dir vi telling us truth vi lud
Li dir Your nur Lord est Lord de heavens ter kre them. This est testimony al which mi bor witness
Mi jxur DI mi hav plan deal kun your statu vi las
Li romp them into pec escept por grand unu ili refer gxi
Ili dir Whoever did this our di est really transgressor
Ili dir Ni auxd youth minac them; li est vok Abraham
Ili dir Bring him okul all popol ili bor witness
Ili dir vi do this our di O Abraham
Li dir est grand unu did gxi. Ir pet them se ili parol
Ili sorb aback dir al Ja vi est des unu transgressing
Ili reverted their old ide Vi kon plen put ke these ne parol
Li dir vi tiam worship DI Do ki ne posed potenc benefit vi harm vi
Vi incurred fi worshipping idols DI! Vi ne kompren
Ili dir Brul him support your di this est ki vi decid do
Ni dir O fajr est cool sekur por Abraham
Tiel ili schemed him ni far them losers
Ni sav him ni sav Lot land ni ben all popol
Ni granted him Isaac Jacob gift ni far them ambaux righteous
Ni far them imams direkt en accordance kun our commandments ni instru them kiel work righteousness kiel observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat)! Al us ili devoted worshipers
As por Lot ni granted him wisdom knowledge ni sav him el community ke practiced abomen; ili est wicked evil popol
Ni admitted him our mercy li est righteous
antaux ke, Noah vok ni respond him. Ni sav him his famili el great disaster
Ni supported him popol rejected our revelations. Ili est evil popol ni dron them all
David Solomon when ili once regul regard someone's crop ke detru another's sxaf ni witnessed their judgment
Ni granted Solomon gxust kompren ni dot ambaux them kun wisdom knowledge. Ni committed mont dejxor David glor (Di) tro bird! This est ki ni did
Ni instru him skill far sxild protekt vi en milit! Est vi tiam thankful
Solomon ni committed vent gusting blov his disposal. Li direct gxi as li wished whatever land li chose ni ben such land him. Ni est fully aware da all ajx
(De diabl tie est those dive him rikolt mar) do whatever li komand them do Ni committed them en his service
Job implored his Lord Adversity befallen me de all merciful unu Vi est plej Merciful
Ni respond him relieved his adversity restored his famili por him ecx twice as mult. Ke est mercy us reminder worshipers
Ankaux Ismail Idris Zal-Kifl; all est steadfast pacient
Ni admitted them our mercy ili est righteous
Zan-Noon (Jonah 1 kun â€˜N' en his nom) abandoned his misi en protest opini ni ne control him! Li ended imploring darkness grand fisx belly Tie ne est di Vi. Vi glor. Mi committed gross pek
Ni respond him sav him el kriz; ni tiel sav believers
Zachariah implored his Lord My Lord do ne keep me heir Vi est bon inheritor
Ni respond him granted him John; ni fiks his wife him! Ili uz hasten work righteousness implored us situaci de joy ankaux as tim! Al us ili est reverent
As por 1 who argument her virginity ni blov her our spirit tiel ni far her her fil portent des whole mond
Your congregation est 1 congregation mi sol est your Lord vi worship Me sol
Ili divid disput religi. All da them ven us judgment
As por those work righteousness while kred their work ne ir waste ni recording gxi
Gxi forbidden any community ni annihilated return
Ne Gog Magog reappear testament ili tiam return - Ili ven cxiu direction
Est when inevitable prophecy ven pas disbelievers stare en horror Ve al us ni est oblivious! Ja ni est wicked
Vi idols vi worship besides DI testament est fuel Infer; this est your inevitable destiny
those est di ili ne ended Infer. All its inhabitants abide gxi forever
Ili sigh gxem therein ili ne hav access any news
As por those ind our magnificent rekompenc ili protekt el gxi
Ili ne auxd its sibl Ili gxu abode kie ili get cxio ili dezir forever
great horror ne worry them angxel ricev them joyfully This est your tag promes vi
Ke tag ni fald heaven fald libr. Just as ni iniciat 1 creation ni ripet gxi. This est our promes; ni certainly port gxi
Ni dekret Psalm tro as ali scriptures ti ter hered My righteous worshipers
This est proclamation popol est worshipers
Ni send vi mercy us des whole mond
Proklam mi don divine inspiration your di est 1 di! Vi tiam submit
Ili turn tiam dir mi avert vi suficx mi ne hav ide kiel baldaux late (retribution) ven vi
Li est fully aware da your publik utterances Li est fully aware da cxio vi conceal
all mi kon this mond est test vi temporary enjoyment
Dir My Lord Your judgment est absolut justice Our Lord est plej Gracious; nur His help streb en des vizagx de your pretend
